description.raw:
The steering wheel is raised to make it easier for Atlas to fit in the Polaris. The steering wheel also has visuals that rotate with the steering wheel.

The collision shape for the seat is lowered as well.

The roll bar and side handles now have simple collision shapes.

![Side view](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96660379/atlas_polaris_side.png)

![Top view](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/96660379/atlas_polaris_top.png)

Retargeted to default

UPDATE:

* merge with default, fix steering wheel axis
* Update contact parameters for wheels, seat
* Reduce size of door handles
* Reduced size of wheel well in visual mesh
* Added collision shape for side body panel near wheel well
* Fixed wheel friction, added wheel camber to give 1 contact point on flat ground, fixed steering wheel inertia

![new door handles](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96660379/door_handles.jpg)

![new collision shapes](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96660379/polaris_collisions.jpg)

  • Update contact parameters for wheels, seat
  • Reduce size of door handles
  • Reduced size of wheel well in visual mesh
  • Added collision shape for side body panel near wheel well
  • Fixed wheel friction, added wheel camber to give 1 contact point on flat ground, fixed steering wheel inertia
